-------------------------------------
Here a free interpretation of the presentation made by lytex at the Chaos Communication Congres (CCC):38C3 in Hamburg

https://fahrplan.events.ccc.de/congress/2024/abfahrplan/talk/QTVVQF/

I'am not sure the result is a Bossa Nova beat... I cant remember the A and B pulses Lytex used in his example.

But a good occasion to implement the XOR logical function in noisecraft.

Enjoy, 

(a or not b)
https://aornotb.bandcamp.com/"}}}}
